General.Name: FibroBiologics, Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: FibroBiologics, Inc. operates as a cell therapy, regenerative medicine company. It is developing a pipeline of treatments and potential cures for chronic diseases using fibroblast cells and fibroblast-derived materials. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 455 East Medical Center Boulevard, Houston, TX, United States, 77598
